offer_description_terms: This offer is applicable only for new users for first booking
Both referrer and referee will get the discount
Valid from June 1 to June 30. New customers only
Valid from 1 December to 30 December. New customers only
This offer is valid only on Diwali week
Valid on services based on Saturday and Sunday
Valid from 6th booking onwards. Minimum 5 bookings should be there
Valid on advance bookings made 7 days prior
Valid for 24 hours only on certain days
